name: Do Not
description:
We made this game during the 2022 Global Game Jam.

"Do Not" is a game about the duality of games and their relationship with the player: as games evolved, extreme genres came to be, from narrative-centric walking simulators to the strange phenomenon of idle and clicker games, up to the point that some games look like they don't really need a heavily-involved player or player interaction.

"Do Not" is not only a child of this "statement", but also a game born out of the need for something simple, given that we ended up being a team of almost exclusively designers.

Within its own nature, "Do Not" is a game meant to be NOT played.
